issue.title: [C++] Re-enable unused-variable warning
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12982](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12982). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I was playing around with cmake flags and at one point enabled all warnings.  I noticed that this warning has only one violation.  It's possible there are additional violations in some of the lesser built modules / integrations but we could also consider re-enabling the warning.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12982?focusedCommentId=17358688) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 10458
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/10458>
